Pre-Game Insights: The Bulls have gone 6-11 in home games.
Chicago ranks third in the Eastern Conference in rebounding averaging 45.1 rebounds.
Nikola Vucevic leads the Bulls with 10.1 boards.
The Spurs are 10-3 when it turns the ball over less than its opponents and averages 14.1 turnovers per game.
The Bulls are shooting 46.9% from the field this season, 1.6 percentage points higher than the 45.3% the Spurs allow to opponents.
The Spurs average 13.5 made 3-pointers per game this season, 0.1 more makes per game than the Bulls allow.
Vucevic is averaging 20.4 points, 10.1 rebounds and 3.3 assists for the Bulls.
Julian Champagnie is shooting 43.3% and averaging 12.1 points for the Spurs.
Others: The game will take place in Chicago on Monday at 8 p.m. EST.
The Bulls have a 6-4 record in their last 10 games, averaging 114.7 points, 47.6 rebounds, 30.2 assists, 8.3 steals and 4.7 blocks per game while shooting 44.6% from the field.
The Spurs have a 5-5 record in their last 10 games, averaging 111.1 points, 48.4 rebounds, 30.4 assists, 6.8 steals and 7.6 blocks per game while shooting 45.2% from the field.
The Bulls have injuries to Torrey Craig and Ayo Dosunmu.
The Spurs do not have any listed injuries.
